header_text: One day after work, you notice an elder neighbor slowly walking from their car to their house. They look off balance and you are worried that they are going to fall. You ask whether they need help, and they turn and stare at you, looking offended.

elements.Text: Does your neighbor appreciate your offer to help with the groceries?

elements.name: One day after work, you notice an elder neighbor slowly walking from their car to their house. They look off balance and you are worried that they are going to fall. You ask whether they need help, and they turn and stare at you, looking offended._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
